resources.string: 1. Which of these images displays a wireframe?
2. Which of these 2 answers are primitive data types?
3. Fill in the blank. IDE stands for integrated _____ environment
4. In XML, what does the padding property do?
A. Adjust the space OUTSIDE of the border
B. Adjust the space INSIDE of the border
5. Write this line of code more efficiently: \nx + 2 = x;
When finished with exam, press the submit button to view your grade.
